title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Leverage observability to build responsible AI applications (COP360)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用可观测性构建负责任的AI应用程序 (COP360)
abstract: As AI adoption accelerates, maintaining effective oversight of machine learning systems becomes crucial. This lightning talk explores how CloudWatch enables responsible AI observability through Amazon Bedrock. Learn practical approaches to monitor model performance, track usage patterns and gain insights into emerging safety concerns, detect hallucinations, misuse and harmful content using native integrations between CloudWatch and Bedrock.
abstract_cn: 随着人工智能应用的加速普及，对机器学习系统保持有效监督变得至关重要。本次闪电演讲探讨了如何通过 Amazon Bedrock 利用 CloudWatch 实现负责任的 AI 可观测性。了解监控模型性能、跟踪使用模式、洞察新兴安全问题的实用方法，以及如何使用 CloudWatch 与 Bedrock 之间的原生集成来检测幻觉、滥用和有害内容。
